discussion.content:
Correct answer is A. 
NOT - D:Third Party Video endpoint requires manual DSCP marking. Cisco Video devices download the marking from CUCM.
NOT - B: Because TelePresence endpoint can be marking at field DSCP for TelePresence Calls under System>Service Parameter.
it could be B the correct answer. Third Party Video endpoint requires manual DSCP marking. Cisco Video devices download the marking from CUCM.

questions.question_text: Which type of endpoints support the DSCP for Video Calls parameter in Cisco Unified CM?
How can you configure VCS Expressway to make sure an external caller cannot reach a specific internal address?

choices.D: You add the specific URI in the firewall section of the VCS Expressway and block it.
choices.E: You block the call with a search rule that has a high priority in the VCS Expressway. E
choices.C: You add a search rule to block any call to the specific URI on the internal VCS Control.
choices.B: You make a transform on the VCS Expressway to direct the call to VCS Control, which can block the call.
choices.A: VCS Expressway only forwards calls to Cisco Unified Communications Manager who block calls.

questions.question_text: An engineer must ensure that Expressway-E listens and only its legit sender of such traffic is Expressway-C. Which port must be opened to accomplish this task?

discussion.content:
The only legitimate sender of such traffic is the Expressway-C (cluster)
https://www.cisco.com/c/dam/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/expressway/admin_guide/Cisco-Expressway-Administrator-Guide-X8-10-3.pdf
Answer is C. The Expressway-E listens on port 2222 for SSH tunnel traffic

choices.D: The Cisco Unified Communications Manager zone configured in VCS must have SIP authentication trust mode set to On.
choices.E: The Cisco Unified Communications Manager zone configured in VCS must have TLS verify mode set to Off. AE
choices.C: A SIP trunk security profile must be configured with the X.509 Subject Name from the VCS certificate.
choices.A: The root CA of the VCS server certificate must be loaded in Cisco Unified Communications Manager.
choices.B: A SIP trunk security profile must be configured with Incoming Transport Type set to TCP+UDP.

discussion.content:
Ignore the above answer, correct answer A&C
VCS configuration > Zones > Zones

Port 5061
Transport TLS
TLS verify mode On
Authentication trust mode Off

questions.question_text:
Which two statements about configuring an encrypted trunk between Cisco TelePresence Video Communication Server and Cisco Unified Communications
Manager are true? (Choose two.)
Which two options are dial-plan challenges in a multisite Cisco Unified Communications Manager deployment? (Choose two.)

choices.B: use of same DID numbers in multiple sites
choices.D: use of +E.164 directory numbers and extensions for phones and services
choices.A: use of MGCP gateways instead of SIP trunks
choices.C: use of same length directory numbers all over the network
choices.E: telephony service provider requirements on number format and types AD
